Title: 1,778 Stories of Me and My Wife
Writer: Taku Mayumura (based on the book by)
Actors: Michiko Kichise, Tsuyoshi Kusanagi, Ren Osugi, YÃ»ko Takeuchi
Plot: A science fiction writer finds out his wife has cancer, and decides to write her a story every day to keep her alive, like a reverse Scheherazade or perhaps to cope with the inevitability of his loss.
